content: > who doesn t love a free pattern if > you love this pattern make sure you > favorite it and save it in your queue would you love to be notified of all twin stitches patterns sign up for my newsletter so as not to miss out 1 buy 3 get one free place 4 of my self-published patterns in your cart and the 4th least expensive will be free no code needed please note this can t be combined with another coupon code **sizes** toddler child adult small adult medium adult large adult x-large to fit approximately 5 5 6 5 7 8 8 5 9 5 / 14 16 5 18 20 21 5 24 cm **yarn** the sample was knit using ruby and roses plump rose sock set 100 grams 400 yards / 365 meters 85% superwash merino 15% nylon 2 ply shown in sock mania sock set **needles** us 5 / 3 75 mm or size needed to obtain correct gauge sample was knit using 32 / 81 cm cable with the magic loop method **gauge** 22 stitches x 32 row per 4 / 10 cm **notions** tapestry needle stitch marker 1 https //twinstitchesdesigns myflodesk com/x130ufm3sd
